tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grant_applicants (
  applicant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  submission_deadline DATE
)

CREATE TABLE grant_contacts (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_id INT REFERENCES grant_applicants(applicant_id),
  contact_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  contact_phone TEXT,
  contact_relation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE applicant_contacts (
    contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_id INT,
    contact_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE applicants (
  applicant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  phone_number TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
  review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  submission_id UUID,
  reviewer_id UUID,
  review_date TIMESTAMP,
  comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reviewers (
  reviewer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name TEXT,
  last_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  role TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE applications (
  application_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  applicant_id UUID,
  submission_id UUID,
  status TEXT,
  decision_date TIMESTAMP
);
